;  -- Order in ascending order for the last 100 blocks
WITH max_height AS (
  SELECT MAX(height) AS highest_height
  FROM babylon_btc_lightclient_${chain_id}
)
SELECT
  bbl.height, -- height, header_count, btc_headers.
  bbl.header_count,
  vi.operator_address as address,
  bbl.btc_headers
FROM
  babylon_btc_lightclient_${chain_id} bbl
JOIN
  meta.validator_info vi
  ON bbl.reporter_id = vi.id
JOIN
  max_height mh  -- Join to get the maximum block height
  ON bbl.height BETWEEN (mh.highest_height - 1000) AND mh.highest_height
ORDER BY height asc

WITH latest_delegations AS (
    SELECT * 
    FROM public.babylon_btc_delegation 
    ORDER BY height DESC
    LIMIT 100
)
SELECT 
    ld.chain_info_id,
    ld.height AS delegation_height,
    ld.btc_staking_tx_hash,
    COALESCE(bcs.height, -1) AS signature_height,  
    COALESCE(bcs.covenant_btc_pk_id, cci.id) AS covenant_btc_pk_id,
    COALESCE(cci.covenant_btc_pk, 'N/A') AS covenant_btc_pk,
    CASE 
        WHEN bcs.btc_staking_tx_hash IS NOT NULL AND cci.id IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE
        ELSE FALSE
    END AS status
FROM latest_delegations ld
CROSS JOIN meta.covenant_committee_info cci 
LEFT JOIN public.babylon_covenant_signature bcs 
    ON ld.btc_staking_tx_hash = bcs.btc_staking_tx_hash
    AND ld.chain_info_id = bcs.chain_info_id
    AND cci.id = bcs.covenant_btc_pk_id
WHERE ld.chain_info_id = cci.chain_info_id
ORDER BY ld.height DESC, cci.id;

;  -- Order in ascending order for the last 100 blocks
WITH max_height AS (
  SELECT MAX(height) AS highest_height
  FROM babylon_finality_provider_${chain_id}
)
SELECT
  bfp.height,
  bfp.status,
  fpi.moniker AS moniker,
  fpi.operator_address as address,
  fpi.btc_pk as btc_pk
FROM
  babylon_finality_provider_${chain_id} bfp
JOIN
  meta.finality_provider_info fpi
  ON bfp.finality_provider_pk_id = fpi.id
JOIN
  max_height mh  -- Join to get the maximum block height
  ON bfp.height BETWEEN (mh.highest_height - 50) AND mh.highest_height
ORDER by
  bfp.height ASC

;  -- Order in ascending order for the last 100 blocks
WITH max_height AS (
  SELECT MAX(height) AS highest_height
  FROM voteindexer_${chain_id}
)
SELECT
  vidx.height,
  vidx.status,
  vi.moniker AS moniker
FROM
  voteindexer_${chain_id} vidx
JOIN
  meta.validator_info vi
  ON vidx.validator_hex_address_id = vi.id
JOIN
  max_height mh  -- Join to get the maximum block height
  ON vidx.height BETWEEN (mh.highest_height - 50) AND mh.highest_height
ORDER by
  vidx.height ASC

WITH epoch AS (
  SELECT MAX(epoch) as max_epoch FROM babylon_checkpoint_${chain_id}
)
 select
  idx.height,
  idx.status,
  vi.moniker AS moniker,
  idx.epoch
FROM
  babylon_checkpoint_${chain_id} idx
JOIN
  meta.validator_info vi
  ON idx.validator_hex_address_id = vi.id
JOIN
  epoch
  ON idx.epoch BETWEEN (epoch.max_epoch - 30) AND epoch.max_epoch
ORDER by
  idx.height DESC
